channel.title: Personal on Marko Vejnovic
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Marko Vejnovic

item.title: Flashing a Chinese Phone
item.description: Introduction So, about three days ago, I managed to get my hands on a cheapish second hand Xiaomi Redmi Note 4. I didn’t really have a phone for almost a year, and living without a phone in China to be very difficult. I decided to buy a cheap phone on Xianyu. Buying the phone After looking around a bit, I concluded that the Xiaomi Redmi 4X seemed to be a good phone for my requirements.

item.title: Website Online
item.description: Finally, after a prolonged period, I am publishing this website! Some of my projects are up, others are not, but, as time goes on I plan on adding more and more stuff here. Sadly, I am quite busy to commit fully to this website, but when I have time, I will set it up!
